member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityHierarchicalDependencyResolver
member.summary: An implementation of that wraps a Unity container and creates a new child container when is invoked.
member.remarks: Because each scope creates a new child Unity container, you can benefit from using the lifetime manager.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityHierarchicalDependencyResolver.#ctor(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for a container.
member.param: The to wrap with the interface implementation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityHierarchicalDependencyResolver.BeginScope
member.summary: Starts a resolution scope by creating a new child Unity container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityHierarchicalDependencyResolver.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves an instance of the default requested type from the container.
member.param: The of the object to get from the container.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityHierarchicalDependencyResolver.GetServices(System.Type)
member.param: The type of the requested services.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityDependencyResolver
member.summary: An implementation of the interface that wraps a Unity container.

member.param: The to wrap with the interface implementation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityDependencyResolver.BeginScope
member.summary: Reuses the same scope to resolve all the instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.Unity.WebApi.UnityDependencyResolver.GetService(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves an instance of the default requested type from the container.
member.param: The of the object to get from the container.
